CardData.Name: Practical_Joke
CardData.Description: Inflict 90 dmg. On the next attack, the enemy has a 40% chance to dmg a member of their team.

CardData.Name: Trauma
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies 3 times for 75  dmg each hit. 50% chance to Apply Heal Block per hit.

CardData.Name: Serate
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 95 dmg and apply Bleed.

CardData.Name: Pandora's_Box
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 90 dmg. On next turn, increase atk power by 50% per debuff on targeted enemy.

CardData.Name: Talon_Grip
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 115 damage. 40% chance to inflict Singe.

CardData.Name: Avenger
CardData.Description: Boost atk spd for 2 turns. For each dead ally, increase dmg of your next attack by 25%.

CardData.Name: Relentless
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 140 dmg and recover 50% of total dmg dealt.

CardData.Name: Brace_Yourself
CardData.Description: Reduce incoming damage by 60%

CardData.Name: Static Shock
CardData.Description: When attacked, you reflect 30% of the damage back to the attacker. This buff lasts for 2 turns.

CardData.Name: Enraged
CardData.Description: Attack the enemy to deal 40 damage. On your next turn, your attack power increases proportional to your lost HP.

CardData.Name: Shield Wall
CardData.Description: The next two single-target attacks directed at your allies will be redirected to you. Draw 1 card. If you die while buff is active, discard 2 cards.

CardData.Name: Ground Slam
CardData.Description: Attack the enemy for 30 damage. Apply Wound to ALL  enemies for one turn.

CardData.Name: Midas Touch
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies for 90 damage. 35% chance to inflict Awe for one turn. (Stuns enemy and prevents them from attacking for one turn.)

CardData.Name: Watch Out Below
CardData.Description: Surprise the enemy from above by attacking for 100 damage. If the attack lands as a critical hit, draw 1 card.

CardData.Name: Prepare for Battle
CardData.Description: Your attack power increases by 25% on your next attack.

CardData.Name: All or Nothing
CardData.Description: Increase your evasion by 25% for 2 turns. If an attack lands while this buff is active, take 25% increased damage.

CardData.Name: Afterlife
CardData.Description: For one turn, you cannot receive any damage. On this same turn, you cannot inflict any damage. (Debuffs can still land.)

CardData.Name: No More Pain
CardData.Description: Remove all debuffs from one ally and heal that ally for 15% of their Max HP

CardData.Name: Tip the Scales
CardData.Description: Attack target for 90 damage. Heal ally with lowest HP for equal amount of damage dealt.

CardData.Name: We Can Do It
CardData.Description: Remove one debuff from all enemies. Apply healing buff for 5% of your Max HP for 3 turns

CardData.Name: Not_So_Fast
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies for 90 dmg and apply Lethargy with a 75% chance for 2 turns.

CardData.Name: We_Can_Do_It
CardData.Description: Remove one debuff from all enemies. Apply healing buff for 5% of your Max HP for 3 turns

CardData.Name: Hold_Strong
CardData.Description: Heal the target ally for 50 HP. Draw 1 card.

CardData.Name: Icy_Touch
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 90 dmg. 40% chance to inflict Frostbite for 1 turn.
